00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <cusp/detail/config.h>
00024 
00025 #include <cusp/coo_matrix.h>
00026 #include <thrust/unique.h>
00027 #include <thrust/sort.h>
00028 
00029 #include <stdlib.h> // XXX remove when we switch RNGs
00030 
00031 namespace cusp
00032 {
00033 namespace gallery
00034 {
00040 // TODO use thrust RNGs, add seed parameter defaulting to num_rows ^ num_cols ^ num_samples
00041 // TODO document
00042 template <class MatrixType>
00043 void random(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_samples, MatrixType& output)
00044 {
00045     typedef typename MatrixType::index_type IndexType;
00046     typedef typename MatrixType::value_type ValueType;
00047 
00048     cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,cusp::host_memory> coo(num_rows, num_cols, num_samples);
00049 
00050     srand(num_rows ^ num_cols ^ num_samples);
00051 
00052     for(size_t n = 0; n < num_samples; n++)
00053     {
00054         coo.row_indices[n]    = rand() % num_rows;
00055         coo.column_indices[n] = rand() % num_cols;
00056         coo.values[n]         = ValueType(1);
00057     }
00058 
00059     // sort indices by (row,column)
00060     coo.sort_by_row_and_column();
00061 
00062     size_t num_entries = thrust::unique(thrust::make_zip_iterator(thrust::make_tuple(coo.row_indices.begin(), coo.column_indices.begin())),
00063                                         thrust::make_zip_iterator(thrust::make_tuple(coo.row_indices.end(),   coo.column_indices.end())))
00064                          - thrust::make_zip_iterator(thrust::make_tuple(coo.row_indices.begin(), coo.column_indices.begin()));
00065 
00066     coo.resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00067     
00068     output = coo;
00069 }
00073 } // end namespace gallery
00074 } // end namespace cusp
